means: 增加，增大，增多( increase的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Walking and golf increased in popularity during the 1980s.
sentence.Network_cn: 在20世纪80年代越来越多的人喜欢上了远足或是打高尔夫球。

sentence.Network_en: The government increased prices on several basic commodities like bread and meat.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府提高了面包、肉类等几种基本商品的价格。

sentence.Network_en: Unrestricted fares will be increased as much as $80 one-way.
sentence.Network_cn: 弹性票价单程上浮最高可达80美元。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Hunters at an increased risk of infection if they skin an infected rabbit ., 猎人如果皮肤接触一只感染的兔子 , 其感染细菌的危险会升高.
increased 增强, increased 明显增加, increased 提高的
As enemy attacks increased , more and more reinforcements were dispatched to the front ., 由于敌军进攻加剧 , 越来越多的援军被派遣上前线.
2012年4月雅思听力预测(V08114)_新东方网 ... engine n. 发动机 increased adj. 增加的，增强的 higher seat 更高的座位.

list.abs: primary increase 【植】初次增加 progressive increase 递增 speed increase 速度递增 standars Gibbs function increase (热学)标准吉布斯函数增加 statutory salary.
字典中济字的解释 ... (11) 停;止[ stop] (12) 增加[ increase;add] (13) 弥补[ make up].
2011年中考英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... include 包括 624. increase 增长 625. India 印度 626.

entry.def: If something increases or you increase it, it becomes greater in number, level, or amount.
If there is an increase in the number, level, or amount of something, it becomes greater.

example.ex: He called for an increase of 1p on income tax.
example.tran: 他呼吁所得税提高 1 便士。

entry.def: If something is on the increase, it is happening more often or becoming greater in number or intensity.

means.word_mean: 1. made greater in size or amount or degree

auth_sentence.content: There is also an increased risk of certain cancers.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is also an increased risk of certain cancers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is also an increased risk of certain cancers.

auth_sentence.content: The time they spend on these things has increased.
auth_sentence.res_content: The time they spend on these things has increased.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The time they spend on these things has increased.

auth_sentence.content: I think we need an increased sense of urgency.
auth_sentence.res_content: I think we need an increased sense of urgency.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think we need an increased sense of urgency.

Sentence.sentence: E-book sales are up 146 percent over last year, while hardback sales increased 6 percent and paperbacks decreased 8 percent.
He is eager to find a job with an increased salary.
But for the remainder, the risk of cancer, while increased at the end of life, must be balanced with other factors like remaining life expectancy（预期寿命）.
The number of hours Americans work has increased steadily
Water Usage: Over the past century, human use of fresh water has increased at more than double the rate of population growth
Even apart from the increased competition, the kids enter a process that has been utterly transformed from the one baby boomers knew.
